## Validation Checklist
- [ ] `npm run check` passes.
- [ ] `npm run build` passes (if frontend touched).
- [ ] `cargo check` passes (if Rust/Tauri touched).
- [ ] QA Red Team reviewed edge cases and failure paths.
- [ ] Mac Build Engineer verified release/build impact.
- [ ] Documentation Librarian updated affected docs/playbooks.

## Risk Review
- [ ] Database migration/data-loss risk assessed.
- [ ] Security/privacy impact assessed.
- [ ] Rollback plan documented.
